insults: My mamma can play a game better than that, and she's a machine!
There goes a saying in the Field of Justice: git gud scrub
You people really fizz me off.
help: !build [champ] - I'll give you a build for the input champion.
!random [lane] - I'll give you a random champion to play, you can also give the command a specific lane to select for.
!summoner [summonerName] - I'll give you information about the input summoner, or yours if I know it.
!lose - I'll let you know how good you are at video games so you feel better after a tough match.
!free - I'll list the free champions for this week.
!chest [summoner] - Displays the champions that can earn mastery chests.
!mastery [champion] - Displays mastery information for a given champion.
